title: wine_Gary_Farrell_2001_Redwood_Ranch_Sauvignon_Blanc_(Sonoma_County)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 109016.
country: US.
description: If you like yours big and burly, then this might be the right wine for you. Applesauce and lemon meringue pie aromas lead the way toward a palate full of lemon, pineapple, tangerine and vanilla. The finish is stony and leaves a custard-like impression. It's clearly from the barrel-fermented school, but for some that may be fine. For others, however, it will feel overoaked and ponderous on the tongue..
designation: Redwood Ranch.
